hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.travelpermit.report.TravelPermitSummary( permit.id, name.lastName, name.firstName, name.middleName, name.suffix, offender.offenderNumber, permit.dateRange.startDate, permit.dateRange.endDate, permit.purpose, otherTravelers.persons, otherTravelers.relationships, permit.destination.name, permit.destination.telephoneNumber, address.value, (case when address != null then aCity.name else city.name end), (case when address != null then aState.name else state.name end), (case when address != null then aState.abbreviation else state.abbreviation end), (case when address != null then aCountry.name else country.name end), (case when address != null then aCountry.abbreviation else country.abbreviation end), (case when address != null then aZipCode.value else zipCode.value end), (case when address != null then aZipCode.extension else zipCode.extension end), periodicity.name, issuance.date, issuer.id, uname.lastName, uname.firstName, uname.middleName, uname.suffix, issuer.username, transportation.number, transportation.description, method.name, creationSignature.userAccount.user.id, creationSignature.userAccount.username, creationSignature.userAccount.user.name.lastName, creationSignature.userAccount.user.name.firstName, creationSignature.userAccount.user.name.middleName, creationSignature.userAccount.user.name.suffix) from omis.travelpermit.domain.TravelPermit permit inner join permit.transportation transportation inner join transportation.method method inner join permit.offender offender inner join offender.name name left outer join permit.otherTravellers otherTravelers left outer join permit.periodicity periodicity left outer join permit.issuance issuance left outer join issuance.issuer issuer left outer join issuer.user user left outer join user.name uname left outer join permit.destination.address address left outer join address.zipCode aZipCode left outer join permit.destination.zipCode zipCode left outer join permit.destination.city city left outer join aZipCode.city aCity left outer join aCity.state aState left outer join permit.destination.state state left outer join city.country country left outer join aCity.country aCountry left outer join permit.creationSignature creationSignature where offender = :offender order by permit.dateRange.startDate desc
